casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Gimoh SHEARD No. 2019-KK-930 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 7, 2019

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE CRIMINAL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF ORLEANS

Writ denied . Without demonstrating justification as required by Rule 4-3 of the Uniform Rules, Courts of Appeal, the state's application for supervisory review in the appellate court was untimely. GUIDRY, J., would grant.
